arktsVersion_1_0.messageText: Ambient module declaration is not supported (arkts-no-ambient-decls)
Wildcards in module names are not supported (arkts-no-module-wildcards)
"import" statements after other statements are not allowed (arkts-no-misplaced-imports)

arktsVersion_1_1.messageText: Ambient module declaration is not supported (arkts-no-ambient-decls)

"import" statements after other statements are not allowed (arkts-no-misplaced-imports)
